Covid App AstraZeneca Vaccine
Testing123
//AstraZeneca Questions AstraZeneca COVID-19 Vaccine has side effects. Headache is a known side effect of AstraZeneca vaccine. Bleeding is a know side effect of AstraZeneca vaccine. Only one dose of AstraZeneca is required. People under 60 are eligible to take the AstraZeneca vaccine.
TRUE FALSE NEXT Correct! Incorrect!
The Oxfordâ€“AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine, is a viral vector vaccine for prevention of COVID-19. Developed by Oxford University and AstraZeneca, it is given by intramuscular injection, Studies carried out in 2020 showed that the efficacy of the vaccine is 76.0% at preventing symptomatic COVID-19 beginning at 22 days following the first dose and 81.3% after the second dose.
